main.name: Susmitha Anandarao
main.description: with over 5 years of professional experience
main.bio: Backend developer with a Master's degree from The University of Texas at Arlington in Computer Science with over 5 years of experience. Proficiency in Java, C#. Currently exploring Node.js. Looking to expand my leadership skills as I sail through my tech journey.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to leave your message and I will gt back to you at my earliest.

work.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Independently producing production-ready code by leveraging the latest .Net best practices. The Latest project includes development of Azure functions using entity framework core with HTTP triggers. Help with continuous integration and deployment using Azure Dev Ops. Platform and technologies used: .Net, Entity framework core. Microsoft Azure services, ADO, REST services, Bitbucket, JIRA, Agile development(Scrum)

work.title: Associate Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Collaborating on component level technical design. Identifying process improvements at team level to support operations and development ecosystem.  Mentoring and training new associates within the team and training programs. Platform and technologies used: C#, Java, SQL, REST, Docker, Jenkins, Git, Jira, Agile development (Scrum and Kanban), Google Guice, Maven, Crucible

work.title: Technical Intern
work.description: Developed software functions that access the processor through standard hardware port. Developed software tools used to program internal BIST engine, provided fail data and statistics of faults and automated testing across voltage and frequency points.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Making enhancements to existing software with minimal direction for Java, J2EE based applications

testimonials.text: Susmitha is an extremely talented software engineer and an excellent technical leader wherever she goes. She is a very strong technical leader, both with direct reports and without, and is a positive influencer on any team. Any software engineering organization would benefit from having Susmitha on their team.

In my opinion what separates a good developer from a regular developer is this drive to understand the tools that they are using. Susmitha definitely falls in this category. A joy to work with and I will definitely be tracking her down if we have an open position in the future.
